title: Backronyms Quiz
description: Acronyms and initialisms and what they stand for

questions.question: What does the acronym 'SCUBA' stand for?
options: Sealed Container for Underwater Breathing Activity

questions.question: What does 'LASER' stand for?
options: Light Activated System for Energy Release
Light Amplification by Stimulated Emission of Radiation
Linear Amplified Signal for Emission of Radiation
Luminous Activation by Stimulated Energy Rays

questions.question: The word 'RADAR' is actually an acronym. What does it stand for?
What does the initialism 'FAQ' stand for?
The common word 'ZIP' in ZIP code stands for:
What does 'RSVP' stand for in the original French?
What does 'CAPTCHA' stand for?
options: Computer Automated Processing To Check Human Activity
Completely Automated Public Turing test to tell Computers and Humans Apart
Central Automated Program To Catch Hacking Attempts
Computer Analysis Program for Testing Character and Human Access

questions.question: What does the acronym 'AWOL' stand for?
What does 'SOS' officially stand for in maritime distress signals?
options: It doesn't stand for anything â€” it was chosen for its distinctive Morse code pattern

questions.question: What does the acronym 'SNAFU' stand for?
What does 'POTUS' stand for?
options: Premier Officer of The United System

questions.question: What does 'SMART' stand for in SMART goals?
What does 'TASER' stand for?
options: Targeted Area Shock and Energy Release
